title: Technologist Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A person, typically shown working at a computer, representing a technologist, programmer, or someone involved in technology. The medium-light skin tone modifier indicates a specific skin color.
apple_vendor_description: The technologist emoji on Apple devices, rendered with a medium-light skin tone, features a person confidently looking forward, often with a tablet or laptop subtly hinted at in their design.
